Kang family is still searching

Full extent is unknown.

With the father and oldest son missing, my father carried on the affairs of the family.

Father paid for the wedding of 2 brothers, incurring heavy debts, one with double digit interest rates

It wasn't paid off until he went to Vietnam, some years later.

All of the uncles are unique.
